name: CreatorToolHub
description: A Next.js application that hosts multiple creator tools in one place. Features a Thumbnail Creator powered by Google Gemini AI, with NextAuth authentication and modern React 19 architecture.

name: SpeakMCP
description: AI-powered voice assistant with MCP integration. A fork of Whispo that transforms your voice into intelligent actions with advanced speech recognition, LLM processing, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) tool execution.

name: techfren-leaderboard
description: An interactive leaderboard showcasing unofficial Aider polyglot benchmarks for various LLM models, including smaller and lesser-known models that don't appear on the official leaderboard.

name: Awaken Ambience
description: A Python application for having voice, video, and screen sharing conversations with Google's Gemini 2.0 model. Features real-time multimodal input with audio responses.

name: Chaos Coder
description: A Next.js application that generates multiple variations of web applications simultaneously using AI. Each variation is unique in its implementation, styling, and features, helping developers explore different possibilities and approaches to building web applications.

name: Landscape to Portrait Video
description: A Python tool that automatically detects faces in landscape (16:9) videos and creates portrait (9:16) versions optimized for social media platforms. The tool intelligently positions faces at the bottom of the frame while maintaining visual quality.

name: Clickolas Cage
description: a chrome extension that performs web browsing actions autonomously to complete a given goal/task (using LLM as a brain).

name: techfren.net
description: this website you're on right now :)

name: TimestampGenius.com
description: Automatically Generate Timestamps for Youtube Videos with AI

name: BeriGame MMO Alpha
description: A proof of concept cross platform MMO Game

name: big-AGI (Contributor)
description: An AI suite for professionals powered by state-of-the-art models. Features AI personas, multi-model chats, text-to-image, voice, code highlighting and execution, PDF import, and more with a polished UX.

name: Open Interpreter (Contributor)
description: A natural language interface that lets LLMs run code locally. Provides a ChatGPT-like terminal interface that can create and edit files, control browsers, analyze data, and more through natural language commands.

name: OpenHands (Contributor)
description: A platform for software development agents powered by AI. OpenHands agents can modify code, run commands, browse the web, call APIs, and perform tasks just like human developers.

name: Aider (Contributor)
description: AI pair programming in your terminal. Aider lets you pair program with LLMs to start a new project or build on your existing codebase, supporting 100+ programming languages and multiple LLM providers.

name: Transcribe-Anything (Contributor)
description: Multi-backend whisper app. Blazing fast. Mac-arm optimized. Easy install. Input a local file or url and this service will transcribe it using Whisper AI. Completely private and Free.

name: Lightning Whisper MLX (Contributor)
description: An incredibly fast implementation of Whisper optimized for Apple Silicon. Features batched decoding, distilled models, and quantized models - 10x faster than Whisper CPP and 4x faster than current MLX Whisper implementation.
